definition[0]: a small hole in a wall, or between two things that join together, that lets light or air through
example[0]: The sun came through a chink in the curtains.
definition[1]: a high ringing sound made by metal or glass objects hitting each other
definition[2]: if glass or metal objects chink, or if you chink them, they make a high ringing sound when they knock together
example[2]: They chinked their glasses and drank a toast to the couple.
definition[3]: a very offensive word for someone from China. Do not use this word.
